titlestmt.titleproper: Guide to the 1st Kentucky Brigade morning reports, 1848

repository.corpname: The New York Public Library. Manuscripts and Archives Division.

address.addressline: Fifth Avenue at 42nd Street, New York, NY 10018-2788

did.abstract: Morning reports of the 1st Brigade, Kentucky Volunteers, 3rd and 4th Regiments, commanded by Brigadier General Thomas Marshall and Colonel Manlius V. Thomson, respectively. The reports include tabulated returns signed by J. M. Henry for the 3rd Regiment and Ben F. Bradley for the 4th Regiment, and date from January 25 to June 23, 1848

prefercite.p: 1st Kentucky Brigade morning reports, Manuscripts and Archives Division, The New York Public Library
